group_1.textRight: I'm done setting the stones here. @West Oogibashi is done, too.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you. Now everything is in place.
The magic in these stones will conceal @our location from Ryuugasaki.

group_1.textRight: Since we put stones on the east and west bridges, @are we expecting them to come in through @Monzenbashi?
Won't that mean we have to take them head-on there...?

group_1.textLeft: If we show Juri that we're afraid of her, @she'll get more aggressive.
The more time passes, the bolder she'll get.
So taking her head-on from the start is our best bet.
Plus, Ryuugasaki has been silent for the past @several days....
If they're giving us time, we should make @the most of it.

group_1.textRight: Juri being quiet concerns me a little, though.
We expected her to go on the attack the day she declared war, and we've been waiting for it @ever since...

group_1.textLeft: Indeed... That concerns me as well...
What is it?

group_1.textRight: We caught someone trying to steal Grief Seeds.

group_1.textLeft: Who apprehended them?

group_1.textRight: Hikaru did.

group_1.textLeft: ...Understood. I'll be right over. Just don't let the @thief escape.
Where's that Magical Girl from?

group_1.textRight: She says she's from Ryuugasaki.

group_1.textLeft: Hikaru, fill me in on what happened.

group_1.textRight: Aye!
After you told me to watch the Grief Seeds here,
I hid and kept a sharp eye.
That's when this girl showed up and put 'em @into her bag.
And I jumped out and caught her red-handed.

group_1.textLeft: So, she broke in while we were all out, @then...
Why did she do that?

group_1.textRight: Well...
She said the tension of our standoff had darkened @her Soul Gem.
So she got scared and wanted to cleanse it...

group_1.textLeft: I see...

group_1.textRight: Yuna, I want you to forgive her...
I can understand what she's goin' through...

group_1.textLeft: You're a kind girl, Hikaru.
However, due to the situation that we're in, @I cannot let it slide.
Would you let me speak with her in private @for a moment...?

group_1.textRight: Aye...

group_1.textLeft: Hikaru.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102200:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Y-yes?!

group_1.textLeft: You've earned my trust.
Why did you do this? I want to hear it from you @directly.

group_1.textRight: It's what...um...Hikaru... @I mean...it's exactly what Miss Kirari told you...!
I was panicking over the war and got desperate for Grief Seeds...
Please, Yuna... Forgive me...

group_1.textLeft: What you did is unforgivable.
It is tantamount to taking another girl's life. @Do you realize that?

group_1.textRight: [chara:770082:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp*?!

group_1.textLeft: Are you prepared for what comes next?

group_1.textRight: No... Don't kill me...!

group_1.textLeft: Don't misunderstand me, okay?
What I'm asking is, are you ready to devote your life @to Torayamachi?

group_1.textRight: Yes... Yes...of course...!

group_1.textLeft: Then I will forgive you.

group_1.textRight: Thank you so mu-

group_1.textLeft: If you tell me the truth.

group_1.textRight: [chara:770082:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: Heh.
Nevermind. You don't have to say a word.

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: I can see it on your face.
